pr_title: Bulk Export/Import: $export-status Operation support for Delete #112

timeline.message:
Bulk Export/Import: $export-status Operation support for Delete #112

- Clean up BulkData Constants
- Update BulkData Operations
- Refactor the BulkDataClient
- Also implemented, Refine $import, $export and $export-status
operations #55

Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>

timeline.author: albertwang-ibm
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -17,13 +16,11 @@
 import com.ibm.fhir.operation.bulkdata.config.BulkDataConfigUtil;
 
 /**
- * This class implements a cache of BulkData configuration organized by tenantId. Each object stored in the cache will be a
+ * This class implements a cache of BulkData configuration organized by tenantId. Each object stored in the cache will
+ * be a
  * two-level map of SearchParameters organized first by resource type, then by search parameter name.

replies.bodyText: funny - we never caught this in the initial implementation. I'll fix. It's actually suppose to say a map of properties related to the bulkdata export.
replies.author: prb112
